name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForNonInvasiveRespiratorySupport
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Non Invasive Respiratory Support
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to non-invasive respiratory support.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes non-invasive respiratory support. It includes BIPAP, CPAP, high flow nasal cannula, high velocity nasal insufflation.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
